Info.Title: Revelation Road: The Black Rider
Info.Writer: Gabriel Sabloff, Sean Paul Murphy, Gabriel Sabloff (story), Sean Paul Murphy (story), Jeffrey Peterson (story), David A.R. White (story)
Info.Actors: David A.R. White, James Denton, Hilty Bowen, Michael Bailey Smith
Info.Plot: The Rapture has come and gone. In it's wake, a wasteland filled with desperate bandits. Josh McManus, a drifter with a knack for fighting, must find the mysterious "Shepherd" - a dangerous mission that will put his faith to the test.
